plot: Special Agent Darris Cain is on the hunt for an elusive fugitive. His only leads are a reluctant witness held in a military prison and the words &"prey alone&" written in a notebook. Can Cain track him down and discover the true identity of the mysterious criminal?   Written by  Anonymous
title: Prey Alone
plot_es: Special Agent Darris Cain is on the hunt for an elusive fugitive. His only leads are a reluctant witness held in a military prison and the words &"prey alone&" written in a notebook. Can Cain track him down and discover the true identity of the mysterious criminal?   Written by  Anonymous
plot_en: Special Agent Darris Cain is on the hunt for an elusive fugitive. His only leads are a reluctant witness held in a military prison and the words &"prey alone&" written in a notebook. Can Cain track him down and discover the true identity of the mysterious criminal?   Written by  Anonymous
